review_text: Sure here s a review focusing on those aspects Superfoods Organic Wheat Grass Powder Review Quality Superfoods Organic Wheat Grass Powder impresses with its high quality organic ingredients It s evident that care has been taken in sourcing and processing to maintain nutritional integrity Ingredients The powder contains pure organic wheat grass free from additives or fillers ensuring a concentrated dose of nutrients like chlorophyll vitamins and minerals Package The packaging is sturdy and well sealed maintaining freshness The resealable bag is convenient for easy access and storage Ease of Use Mixing the powder into smoothies juices or water is effortless It dissolves well without clumping making it versatile for daily use Benefits Regular consumption supports detoxification boosts energy levels and provides a rich source of antioxidants promoting overall health and vitality Overall Superfoods Organic Wheat Grass Powder stands out for its quality ingredients convenient packaging and ease of use making it an excellent choice for health conscious individuals seeking a nutrient rich supplement

review_title: Energize Your Health with California Gold Nutrition Organic Wheat Grass Powder!
review_text: California Gold Nutrition s Organic Wheat Grass Powder has been a part of my daily wellness routine for the past few months and I m impressed with the benefits it has brought to my health and energy levels The packaging of this product is simple and effective The 8 5 oz 240 g size is generous and provides a substantial amount of wheatgrass powder for its price The resealable bag ensures that the powder remains fresh and dry which is crucial for preserving its nutritional value The taste and texture of this wheatgrass powder are surprisingly pleasant It has a slightly earthy and grassy flavor which I found easy to incorporate into my morning routine I usually mix it with water or blend it into my morning smoothie and it blends well without clumping There s a slight grittiness but it s not overwhelming and doesn t affect the overall experience The nutritional benefits of wheatgrass are well known and this organic powder doesn t disappoint It s packed with essential vitamins minerals and antioxidants providing a natural energy boost and supporting overall health I ve noticed an increase in my energy levels and overall vitality since incorporating this into my daily regimen The fact that it s organic is a big plus for me as I prefer products that are free from pesticides and chemicals Knowing that I m consuming a pure and natural source of wheatgrass makes me feel even better about my choice One downside is that the taste might not be for everyone If you re not accustomed to green earthy flavors it might take some getting used to However the benefits far outweigh any initial hesitation in my opinion Another aspect to consider is the convenience factor It s more convenient than juicing fresh wheatgrass but it still requires some effort in mixing or blending However the trade off between convenience and the health benefits is well worth it for me In conclusion California Gold Nutrition s Organic Wheat Grass Powder is an excellent addition to a healthy lifestyle It provides a natural energy boost supports overall health and is packed with essential nutrients While the taste might not be everyone s favorite the benefits make it a worthwhile choice for those looking to enhance their well being with a superfood I recommend giving it a try and experiencing the positive impact it can have on your health

review_title: A Green Powerhouse: My Take on SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder
review_text: In my quest for a healthier lifestyle I discovered SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder 8 5 oz 240 g and decided to integrate it into my daily nutrition Spirulina a type of blue green algae is famed for its impressive nutrient profile and health benefits Here s my experience after incorporating this superfood into my routine for the past couple of months Taste and Texture Spirulina has a distinctive somewhat fishy taste which can be off putting to some However when mixed into smoothies juices or even yogurts its flavor becomes almost imperceptible The powder itself is fine and blends well although it does turn everything a deep shade of green Nutritional Benefits This spirulina powder is a nutritional powerhouse rich in protein vitamins especially B vitamins minerals including iron and magnesium and antioxidants I started taking it to boost my energy levels and support my immune system and I ve definitely noticed a difference My energy has been more consistent and I ve felt generally healthier and more resilient against common colds Ease of Use The powder format is incredibly versatile I ve experimented with adding it to various dishes and drinks My favorite way to consume it is blended into a morning smoothie with fruits which masks the taste while still delivering all the benefits Effectiveness It s hard to quantify the effect of any one supplement but I can say that since adding spirulina powder to my diet I ve noticed an overall improvement in my energy and vitality It s also been a great way to ensure I get a broad spectrum of nutrients in my diet especially on days when my vegetable intake is less than optimal Digestibility I was initially concerned about potential digestive issues as spirulina is quite high in fiber but I ve had no adverse effects It seems to have actually contributed positively to my digestive health Value Given the density of nutrients and the amount of product you get I find this spirulina powder to offer excellent value for money It s an affordable and efficient way to supplement a healthy diet Final Verdict SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder has earned a permanent spot in my pantry It s an easy effective way to boost my nutritional intake and I appreciate the versatility and health benefits it offers For anyone looking to enhance their diet with a nutrient rich superfood I highly recommend giving this spirulina powder a try

review_text: I really don t like writing bad reviews but this is unfortunately a really bad product I ve tried different spirulina brands it s natural taste is not pleasant to put it mildly but this brand unfortunately manages to really make the barely palatable into almost totally unpalatable There is especially this odd sour taste that almost makes you gag and which I never experienced in other brands If you really want to spot the difference try the other brand that sources its Spirulina from India as well That brand isn t the best either but it is miles ahead of this one The awful taste makes you question could indicate quality issues so I wonder if you really are getting the benefits you are supposed to be getting from Spirulina with this product I bought two bags because of this product because usually California Gold products are of good quality or at least decent However in this case I truly regret this purchase Don t make the same mistake pay a little more for that other brand that sources it from India

For this reason, it’s important to take good care of your liver. California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex uses natural herbal extracts from milk thistle, turmeric, and other plants to help support liver health.* Milk Thistle Benefits Milk thistle (Silybum marianum ) is a flowering herb known for its potential health benefits. Silymarin, an extract taken from the seeds of the milk thistle plant, has antioxidant properties which may help protect the liver from certain toxins to promote a healthy detoxification process.* This supplement combines milk thistle with other liver-supporting and antioxidant-rich herbal extracts, like dandelion, turmeric, artichoke, and ginger to offer a full range of support for your liver.* California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Comple x is formulated with 5 herbal extracts and BioPerine®, a black pepper extract that helps improve absorption. It is suitable for vegetarians and vegans and formulated without gluten, GMOs, or soy. review_text: I ve been using the California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex for liver support and it has quickly become one of my favorite supplements This product combines high quality milk thistle extract with other powerful herbs like dandelion artichoke curcumin and ginger creating a comprehensive formula that supports liver health digestion and overall detoxification After just a few weeks of consistent use I noticed a significant improvement in my digestion and a feeling of overall wellness I appreciate that this supplement contains BioPerine for enhanced absorption ensuring that my body is getting the full benefits of each ingredient The capsules are easy to swallow and gentle on the stomach with no unpleasant aftertaste With 360 veggie capsules the value is unbeatable it lasts a long time and offers a fantastic combination of ingredients that you don t often find in other liver support supplements I highly recommend the California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex to anyone looking to enhance their liver function and boost overall health naturally It s a game changer

review_text: I ve been using California Gold Nutrition s Silymarin Complex which includes Milk Thistle Extract Dandelion Artichoke Curcumin C3 Complex Ginger and BioPerine and I m extremely pleased with the results This supplement has greatly supported my liver health thanks to its high quality ingredients and thoughtful formulation Key Benefits 1 Liver Support and Detoxification The combination of milk thistle dandelion artichoke curcumin and ginger works synergistically to promote liver detoxification and support healthy liver function Since starting this supplement I ve noticed improvements in my digestion and overall gut health 2 Convenience Instead of taking multiple supplements separately this all in one formula makes it convenient to get all the necessary ingredients in one capsule It s particularly useful for someone with a busy schedule like mine 3 High Quality and Easy to Use The capsules are small easy to swallow and have no unpleasant taste The addition of BioPerine enhances the absorption of the ingredients making the supplement more effective Overall I highly recommend California Gold Nutrition s Silymarin Complex for anyone looking to support their liver health and overall detoxification It s an excellent product with a blend of beneficial herbs that provide comprehensive support for the liver

product_name: 2 oz Kanna Tincture Alcohol-Free Healing Herbals
description:
2 ounces of Kanna Tincture 

Alcohol-Free 

Vegetable Glycerin based 

Glass bottle & dropper 

All of our Kanna is harvested in accordance with the Conservation Control Authority of South Africa.

We care deeply about conservation so the growing practices are always all Organic.  Natural Mood Support: Experience the ancient mood-enhancing benefits of Kanna, a revered herb traditionally used by South African indigenous cultures. Our tincture provides a convenient way to harness the calming and uplifting effects of Kanna.

Pure and Potent: We extract our Kanna using a method that preserves the plant's natural alkaloids, ensuring a high-quality, potent tincture. Our product is free from artificial additives and preservatives, delivering pure Sceletium tortuosum in every drop.

Easy to Use: Packaged in a 1 oz (30ml) bottle with a dropper, our Kanna Tincture makes it easy to incorporate this powerful herb into your daily wellness routine. Simply add a few drops to water, tea, or your favorite beverage.

Ethically Sourced: Our Kanna is ethically sourced from sustainable farms, ensuring the highest quality product while supporting responsible farming practices.

Calm and Clarity: Ideal for those seeking natural support for stress relief and mental clarity. Kanna's adaptogenic properties help to manage stress and improve focus without the side effects associated with synthetic alternatives.

Our main growers are fully involved with a formal benefit sharing arrangments with the San and Khoikhoi - the traditional
custodians of the sceletium knowledge. Specifically the !Kai Korana Community and South African San Council.

We ship compostable and in a glass container. 🌍

Thanks for all your support, our shop is a small but our heart is big ❤

Located & shipping out of New York State ✈

review_text: As a result of a severe instance of a congested liver over twenty years ago I began something of a personal crash course to educate myself about what natural healing procedures might be available to me I learned about the value of herbal cleanses one such especially effective herbal regime may have saved my life Over the years I have tried others but none of them have ever included Chanca Piedra as an ingredient While cited as being especially targeted for addressing kidney and gallbladder issues because of the close functional relationship between the healthy functioning of the gallbladder and liver and having been a bit overdue for a kidney cleanse I decided to try straight Chanca Piedra for the first time by purchasing the 16oz bottle After taking the dosage regime recommended as a cleanse as distinct from the more concentrated dosage specific to suffering from kidney stones per se I was so impressed with the results I decided to immediately purchase a second 16 oz bottle to use according to the twice monthly maintenance dosage If the safety and effectiveness of this CNPUSA product is any indication I will certainly be a future customer of their liver cleanse and intermittently other products almost certainly on a life long basis When I discover something of real value it becomes a touchstone that I cherish This is one of those cases

review_text: This really works I have gallstones and have been doing Andreas Moritz liver cleanses each month since August whereby I actually see the stones that come out After using the Chanca for the last few weeks my last cleanse showed what appeared to be pieces of stones I am so glad there is a harmless and painless remedy for getting rid of these large stones that would otherwise be stuck in the gallbladder or require extraction via surgery HIGHLY RECOMMEND

review_text: After my last totally ineffective lithotripsy urologist says I remain in the 8 group since 92 experience successful stone shattering passing with lithotripsies with mounting bills still paying and knowing I cannot afford surgery or another procedure I had to try something else I have not been back for any x ray or CT scan so I have no way of knowing for sure whether the stones are all still there 2 in left kidney 1 in left ureter smaller 1 in right kidney but that one rarely lodging any complaints but since I started taking the Chanca Piedra tincture I have experienced no pain There was some barely noticeable burning you know the urination passing kind of burning very familiar from years of experience so I m hoping praying trusting these stubborn stones are dissolving and passing some matter little by little Note I have been taking the full recommended dosage of three separate 30 mil cap fulls daily morning noon evening I have not yet weaned myself down to just one or two cap fulls daily don t want to go there yet but I can say that I have been without pain or even nagging aches for over a month and a half now when before starting the tincture I was at least aching throughout the day and at times in breath taking pain Admittedly as noted above I have no images as proof so this is just anecdotal before after but I am a happy customer so far Much appreciate the prompt shipping and customer service

review_title: Didn't seem to do much of anything.
review_text: I ve been reading about how California poppy extract has some relaxation benefits and thought I d give this a shot Taking the recommended dosage a couple of times I can t really say that it did much of anything As an alcohol extract you get that strong taste of alcohol if you try it directly under your tongue with a mild flowery aftertaste The next couple of times I tried mixing it in with my daily green drink and didn t really notice the flavor but didn t really notice anything else either

product_name: Silymarin Liver Health Complex, Milk Thistle Extract with Curcumin, Artichoke, Dandelion, Ginger, Black Pepper, 360 Veggie Capsules by California Gold Nutrition
description: California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex Featuring Milk Thistle Extract plus Dandelion, Artichoke, Curcumin C3 Complex®, Ginger, and BioPerine® Supports Liver Health* Suitable for Vegetarians and Vegans Formulated without Gluten, GMOs, or Soy Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility 100% Gold Guarantee  Your liver plays a vital role in your body, as its main function is to filter the blood and remove any waste products or harmful toxins. For this reason, it’s important to take good care of your liver. California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex uses natural herbal extracts from milk thistle, turmeric, and other plants to help support liver health.* Milk Thistle Benefits Milk thistle (Silybum marianum ) is a flowering herb known for its potential health benefits. Silymarin, an extract taken from the seeds of the milk thistle plant, has antioxidant properties which may help protect the liver from certain toxins to promote a healthy detoxification process.* This supplement combines milk thistle with other liver-supporting and antioxidant-rich herbal extracts, like dandelion, turmeric, artichoke, and ginger to offer a full range of support for your liver.* California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Comple x is formulated with 5 herbal extracts and BioPerine®, a black pepper extract that helps improve absorption. It is suitable for vegetarians and vegans and formulated without gluten, GMOs, or soy. It is suitable for vegetarians and vegans and formulated without gluten, GMOs, or soy. review_text: Living in Malta I have always been conscious of maintaining a healthy lifestyle and supporting my liver health especially given our rich Mediterranean diet After doing some research I decided to try California Gold Nutrition s Silymarin Complex and I ve been very impressed with the results Powerful Ingredients for Liver Health The combination of milk thistle dandelion artichoke curcumin ginger and BioPerine provides a comprehensive approach to liver support I was specifically looking for a supplement that included milk thistle due to its renowned benefits for liver detoxification The addition of other ingredients like dandelion and artichoke adds to the formula s potency supporting digestion and overall liver function Ease of Use The capsules are easy to swallow and don t leave any unpleasant aftertaste I appreciate that they are vegetarian which aligns with my preference for plant based products Taking these capsules has become a simple addition to my daily routine Visible Benefits After using this supplement for several months I ve noticed a marked improvement in my digestion and energy levels I feel less bloated after meals and I ve also observed a boost in my overall well being While I can t directly measure liver health the general improvements in my digestion and vitality are promising signs High Quality Product California Gold Nutrition is known for its commitment to quality and this product is no exception The use of BioPerine enhances the absorption of nutrients which is a smart addition to the formula ensuring I get the maximum benefit from each ingredient Convenience in Malta Finding a comprehensive supplement like this in Malta can be challenging but California Gold Nutrition products are readily available online making it easy to access high quality health products despite being on a small island Shipping was efficient and the packaging ensured the capsules arrived in perfect condition Conclusion I highly recommend California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex to anyone looking to support their liver health and overall wellness It s a well rounded supplement that delivers on its promises

It is suitable for vegetarians and vegans and formulated without gluten, GMOs, or soy. product_name: BulkSupplements.com Grape Seed Extract Powder - Antioxidant Supplement - Vein Support Supplements - Eye Pressure Support (250 Grams)
description:
What Is Grape Seed Extract?

Grape seed extract is derived from the ground up grape seeds used to manufacture red wine.


Grape Seed Extract Benefits

Grape seed extract is rich in antioxidants and contains powerful chemicals, such as resveratrol, which may promote overall wellness.† It may help support the cardiovascular system and maintain weight in individuals when taken in conjunction with diet and exercise.† It may contribute to the skin and fortify the joints.† Grape seed extract may support and promote kidneys and liver function.† It may also support the brain which helps promote cognitive function.†


† These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.


BulkSupplements.com Grape Seed Extract Features:
ingredient: Grape Seed Extract ( Vitis vinifera L. ) (Seed)

description:
What Is Stone Breaker (Chanca Piedra)?

Stone breaker is a common tropical plant found in coastal areas. It is also known as chanca piedra (Phyllanthus niruri), Gale of the Wind, or Seed-Under-Leaf.


Stone Breaker (Chanca Piedra) Benefits

Stone breaker (chanca piedra) has a wide variety of benefits, including supporting kidney function and contributing to the heart and cardiovascular system.† It may help maintain blood glucose levels in individuals and support joints.† Stone breaker fortifies the immune system, promotes liver function, and may also aid digestion.†


† These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.


BulkSupplements.com Chanca Piedra Extract (Stone Breaker) Features:
ingredient: Chanca Piedra Extract ( Phyllanthus niruri ) (Whole herb), Dextrin

description: CaliPM Valerian Root & California Poppy Natural Sleep Aid is the perfect solution for anyone who has trouble falling asleep or staying asleep due to stress, anxiety, or nighttime discomfort. The powerful combination of Valerian Root and California Poppy work together to calm your nervous system and promote deep, restful sleep. California Poppy is a gentle herb that helps to soothe nighttime discomfort, making it easier to fall and stay asleep. With 100 capsules and 600mg per serving, you can rest easy knowing that you'll have a good night's sleep whenever you need it. review_text: I recently started taking this wheat grass powder after hearing about its numerous health benefits Although I can t comment on the long term effects just yet I wanted to share my initial impressions First and foremost I found the taste to be quite pleasant contrary to some of the less favorable reviews I ve read It s not gross at all in fact I actually enjoy it I appreciate that it s easy to incorporate into my daily routine I ll be sure to update this review as I continue to use the powder and see any potential results For now I m pleased with both the taste and the quality

review_title: Energize Your Health with California Gold Nutrition Organic Wheat Grass Powder!
review_text: California Gold Nutrition s Organic Wheat Grass Powder has been a part of my daily wellness routine for the past few months and I m impressed with the benefits it has brought to my health and energy levels The packaging of this product is simple and effective The 8 5 oz 240 g size is generous and provides a substantial amount of wheatgrass powder for its price The resealable bag ensures that the powder remains fresh and dry which is crucial for preserving its nutritional value The taste and texture of this wheatgrass powder are surprisingly pleasant It has a slightly earthy and grassy flavor which I found easy to incorporate into my morning routine I usually mix it with water or blend it into my morning smoothie and it blends well without clumping There s a slight grittiness but it s not overwhelming and doesn t affect the overall experience The nutritional benefits of wheatgrass are well known and this organic powder doesn t disappoint It s packed with essential vitamins minerals and antioxidants providing a natural energy boost and supporting overall health I ve noticed an increase in my energy levels and overall vitality since incorporating this into my daily regimen The fact that it s organic is a big plus for me as I prefer products that are free from pesticides and chemicals Knowing that I m consuming a pure and natural source of wheatgrass makes me feel even better about my choice One downside is that the taste might not be for everyone If you re not accustomed to green earthy flavors it might take some getting used to However the benefits far outweigh any initial hesitation in my opinion Another aspect to consider is the convenience factor It s more convenient than juicing fresh wheatgrass but it still requires some effort in mixing or blending However the trade off between convenience and the health benefits is well worth it for me In conclusion California Gold Nutrition s Organic Wheat Grass Powder is an excellent addition to a healthy lifestyle It provides a natural energy boost supports overall health and is packed with essential nutrients While the taste might not be everyone s favorite the benefits make it a worthwhile choice for those looking to enhance their well being with a superfood I recommend giving it a try and experiencing the positive impact it can have on your health

review_title: A Green Powerhouse: My Take on SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder
review_text: In my quest for a healthier lifestyle I discovered SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder 8 5 oz 240 g and decided to integrate it into my daily nutrition Spirulina a type of blue green algae is famed for its impressive nutrient profile and health benefits Here s my experience after incorporating this superfood into my routine for the past couple of months Taste and Texture Spirulina has a distinctive somewhat fishy taste which can be off putting to some However when mixed into smoothies juices or even yogurts its flavor becomes almost imperceptible The powder itself is fine and blends well although it does turn everything a deep shade of green Nutritional Benefits This spirulina powder is a nutritional powerhouse rich in protein vitamins especially B vitamins minerals including iron and magnesium and antioxidants I started taking it to boost my energy levels and support my immune system and I ve definitely noticed a difference My energy has been more consistent and I ve felt generally healthier and more resilient against common colds Ease of Use The powder format is incredibly versatile I ve experimented with adding it to various dishes and drinks My favorite way to consume it is blended into a morning smoothie with fruits which masks the taste while still delivering all the benefits Effectiveness It s hard to quantify the effect of any one supplement but I can say that since adding spirulina powder to my diet I ve noticed an overall improvement in my energy and vitality It s also been a great way to ensure I get a broad spectrum of nutrients in my diet especially on days when my vegetable intake is less than optimal Digestibility I was initially concerned about potential digestive issues as spirulina is quite high in fiber but I ve had no adverse effects It seems to have actually contributed positively to my digestive health Value Given the density of nutrients and the amount of product you get I find this spirulina powder to offer excellent value for money It s an affordable and efficient way to supplement a healthy diet Final Verdict SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder has earned a permanent spot in my pantry It s an easy effective way to boost my nutritional intake and I appreciate the versatility and health benefits it offers For anyone looking to enhance their diet with a nutrient rich superfood I highly recommend giving this spirulina powder a try

review_text: I really don t like writing bad reviews but this is unfortunately a really bad product I ve tried different spirulina brands it s natural taste is not pleasant to put it mildly but this brand unfortunately manages to really make the barely palatable into almost totally unpalatable There is especially this odd sour taste that almost makes you gag and which I never experienced in other brands If you really want to spot the difference try the other brand that sources its Spirulina from India as well That brand isn t the best either but it is miles ahead of this one The awful taste makes you question could indicate quality issues so I wonder if you really are getting the benefits you are supposed to be getting from Spirulina with this product I bought two bags because of this product because usually California Gold products are of good quality or at least decent However in this case I truly regret this purchase Don t make the same mistake pay a little more for that other brand that sources it from India

For this reason, it’s important to take good care of your liver. California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex uses natural herbal extracts from milk thistle, turmeric, and other plants to help support liver health.* Milk Thistle Benefits Milk thistle (Silybum marianum ) is a flowering herb known for its potential health benefits. Silymarin, an extract taken from the seeds of the milk thistle plant, has antioxidant properties which may help protect the liver from certain toxins to promote a healthy detoxification process.* This supplement combines milk thistle with other liver-supporting and antioxidant-rich herbal extracts, like dandelion, turmeric, artichoke, and ginger to offer a full range of support for your liver.* California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Comple x is formulated with 5 herbal extracts and BioPerine®, a black pepper extract that helps improve absorption. It is suitable for vegetarians and vegans and formulated without gluten, GMOs, or soy. product_name: 2 oz Kanna Tincture Alcohol-Free Healing Herbals
description:
2 ounces of Kanna Tincture 

Alcohol-Free 

Vegetable Glycerin based 

Glass bottle & dropper 

All of our Kanna is harvested in accordance with the Conservation Control Authority of South Africa.

We care deeply about conservation so the growing practices are always all Organic.  Natural Mood Support: Experience the ancient mood-enhancing benefits of Kanna, a revered herb traditionally used by South African indigenous cultures. Our tincture provides a convenient way to harness the calming and uplifting effects of Kanna.

Pure and Potent: We extract our Kanna using a method that preserves the plant's natural alkaloids, ensuring a high-quality, potent tincture. Our product is free from artificial additives and preservatives, delivering pure Sceletium tortuosum in every drop.

Easy to Use: Packaged in a 1 oz (30ml) bottle with a dropper, our Kanna Tincture makes it easy to incorporate this powerful herb into your daily wellness routine. Simply add a few drops to water, tea, or your favorite beverage.

Ethically Sourced: Our Kanna is ethically sourced from sustainable farms, ensuring the highest quality product while supporting responsible farming practices.

Calm and Clarity: Ideal for those seeking natural support for stress relief and mental clarity. Kanna's adaptogenic properties help to manage stress and improve focus without the side effects associated with synthetic alternatives.

Our main growers are fully involved with a formal benefit sharing arrangments with the San and Khoikhoi - the traditional
custodians of the sceletium knowledge. Specifically the !Kai Korana Community and South African San Council.

We ship compostable and in a glass container. 🌍

Thanks for all your support, our shop is a small but our heart is big ❤

Located & shipping out of New York State ✈

review_text: As a result of a severe instance of a congested liver over twenty years ago I began something of a personal crash course to educate myself about what natural healing procedures might be available to me I learned about the value of herbal cleanses one such especially effective herbal regime may have saved my life Over the years I have tried others but none of them have ever included Chanca Piedra as an ingredient While cited as being especially targeted for addressing kidney and gallbladder issues because of the close functional relationship between the healthy functioning of the gallbladder and liver and having been a bit overdue for a kidney cleanse I decided to try straight Chanca Piedra for the first time by purchasing the 16oz bottle After taking the dosage regime recommended as a cleanse as distinct from the more concentrated dosage specific to suffering from kidney stones per se I was so impressed with the results I decided to immediately purchase a second 16 oz bottle to use according to the twice monthly maintenance dosage If the safety and effectiveness of this CNPUSA product is any indication I will certainly be a future customer of their liver cleanse and intermittently other products almost certainly on a life long basis When I discover something of real value it becomes a touchstone that I cherish This is one of those cases

review_text: Have been using the GB complete for about 6 weeks In Feb of this year I was hospialized for acute pancratitis likely due to the passing of a gallstone They said I needed to have my GB removed I responded with No I do not In 6 weeks all pain and tenderness to pressure is gone Now I am just started the bundle and I expect to continue to be pain GB issues free Will keep you posted Alice age 70

review_text: This really works I have gallstones and have been doing Andreas Moritz liver cleanses each month since August whereby I actually see the stones that come out After using the Chanca for the last few weeks my last cleanse showed what appeared to be pieces of stones I am so glad there is a harmless and painless remedy for getting rid of these large stones that would otherwise be stuck in the gallbladder or require extraction via surgery HIGHLY RECOMMEND

review_text: After my last totally ineffective lithotripsy urologist says I remain in the 8 group since 92 experience successful stone shattering passing with lithotripsies with mounting bills still paying and knowing I cannot afford surgery or another procedure I had to try something else I have not been back for any x ray or CT scan so I have no way of knowing for sure whether the stones are all still there 2 in left kidney 1 in left ureter smaller 1 in right kidney but that one rarely lodging any complaints but since I started taking the Chanca Piedra tincture I have experienced no pain There was some barely noticeable burning you know the urination passing kind of burning very familiar from years of experience so I m hoping praying trusting these stubborn stones are dissolving and passing some matter little by little Note I have been taking the full recommended dosage of three separate 30 mil cap fulls daily morning noon evening I have not yet weaned myself down to just one or two cap fulls daily don t want to go there yet but I can say that I have been without pain or even nagging aches for over a month and a half now when before starting the tincture I was at least aching throughout the day and at times in breath taking pain Admittedly as noted above I have no images as proof so this is just anecdotal before after but I am a happy customer so far Much appreciate the prompt shipping and customer service

review_text: Thank you so much CNP for making such a pure and easy to use extract of chanca piedra I had had profound digestive pain for over a year and no doctor nor naturopath was able to help me heal the pain I was told about your liquid extract of the chanca piedra and given good information on how it might help so I tried it and it worked I have been pain free for two months now and am thrilled Amazingly I had even tried chanca piedra in capsule form but was not able to perceive results from it only your liquid extract got through to my body and healed me I am so thankful for your help Love from Ruthie D in California

For this reason, it’s important to take good care of your liver. California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex uses natural herbal extracts from milk thistle, turmeric, and other plants to help support liver health.* Milk Thistle Benefits Milk thistle (Silybum marianum ) is a flowering herb known for its potential health benefits. It is suitable for vegetarians and vegans and formulated without gluten, GMOs, or soy. review_text: I have been taking California Gold Nutrition s Silymarin Complex for a few months now and I am thoroughly impressed with the results This supplement has exceeded my expectations in multiple ways earning a well deserved 5 star rating Effectiveness The combination of milk thistle extract dandelion artichoke Curcumin C3 Complex ginger and BioPerine is exceptionally well formulated I ve noticed a significant improvement in my liver health and overall digestion The milk thistle and dandelion work synergistically to support liver function while the Curcumin C3 Complex and ginger help reduce inflammation and promote better digestion Quality California Gold Nutrition is known for its high quality products and this Silymarin Complex is no exception The ingredients are clearly of premium quality and I appreciate that the product is free from unnecessary fillers and additives The veggie capsules are easy to swallow and gentle on the stomach Value With 120 veggie capsules per bottle this supplement offers great value for money Taking just two capsules a day means the bottle lasts for two months which is quite economical considering the wide range of benefits it provides Packaging The packaging is robust and well designed ensuring the capsules stay fresh The clear labeling provides all the necessary information about the supplement making it easy to understand the benefits and dosage

product_name: BulkSupplements.com Grape Seed Extract Powder - Antioxidant Supplement - Vein Support Supplements - Eye Pressure Support (250 Grams)
description:
What Is Grape Seed Extract?

Grape seed extract is derived from the ground up grape seeds used to manufacture red wine.


Grape Seed Extract Benefits

Grape seed extract is rich in antioxidants and contains powerful chemicals, such as resveratrol, which may promote overall wellness.† It may help support the cardiovascular system and maintain weight in individuals when taken in conjunction with diet and exercise.† It may contribute to the skin and fortify the joints.† Grape seed extract may support and promote kidneys and liver function.† It may also support the brain which helps promote cognitive function.†


† These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.


BulkSupplements.com Grape Seed Extract Features:
ingredient: Grape Seed Extract ( Vitis vinifera L. ) (Seed)

product_name: BulkSupplements.com Chanca Piedra Extract Powder, 500mg - Kidney Supplements - Gallbladder Supplements (250g - 8.8 oz)
description:
What Is Stone Breaker (Chanca Piedra)?

Stone breaker is a common tropical plant found in coastal areas. It is also known as chanca piedra (Phyllanthus niruri), Gale of the Wind, or Seed-Under-Leaf.


Stone Breaker (Chanca Piedra) Benefits

Stone breaker (chanca piedra) has a wide variety of benefits, including supporting kidney function and contributing to the heart and cardiovascular system.† It may help maintain blood glucose levels in individuals and support joints.† Stone breaker fortifies the immune system, promotes liver function, and may also aid digestion.†


† These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.


BulkSupplements.com Chanca Piedra Extract (Stone Breaker) Features:
ingredient: Chanca Piedra Extract ( Phyllanthus niruri ) (Whole herb), Dextrin

product_name: CaliPM Valerian Root & California Poppy Natural Sleep Aid for Deep Sleep & Stress Relief - Calming Nervous System Support - Soothes Nighttime Discomfort - Vegan & Sugar-Free - 100 Capsules - 600mg
description: CaliPM Valerian Root & California Poppy Natural Sleep Aid is the perfect solution for anyone who has trouble falling asleep or staying asleep due to stress, anxiety, or nighttime discomfort. The powerful combination of Valerian Root and California Poppy work together to calm your nervous system and promote deep, restful sleep. Valerian Root has been used for centuries as a natural remedy for insomnia and anxiety. It works by increasing levels of the neurotransmitter GABA in the brain, which helps to calm the nervous system and promote relaxation. California Poppy is a gentle herb that helps to soothe nighttime discomfort, making it easier to fall and stay asleep. Our Natural Sleep Aid is vegan and sugar-free, making it a safe and healthy choice for anyone looking to improve their sleep quality without the use of harsh chemicals or synthetic ingredients. With 100 capsules and 600mg per serving, you can rest easy knowing that you'll have a good night's sleep whenever you need it. Try CaliPM Valerian Root & California Poppy Natural Sleep Aid today and wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated!

description:
Made with great love for Mother Earth

At Secrets of the Tribe, we turn to Earth for help to support and strengthen our health. Thanks to modern technology, we are now able to get the best out of every herb — a pure and rich herbal capsules that contains all the beneficial properties and valuable nutrients. We create every bottle with the purpose of serving those who seek the path to long-lasting wellness. Our love for the planet ties together with our core belief that nature heals.

_______________________________

Herbal capsules consist of a cellulose shell and finely ground herb, no fillers. You get all the nutrients contained in the herb.

We believe in the healing power of nature, which is reflected in our products. Our herbal extracts are wildcrafted, naturally sourced, cruelty-free, GMO-free, and thoughtfully processed and packaged for you. We recognize the unique benefits that nature offers for both physical and mental health and aim to create products that embody this belief in natural healing.

Our formula is completely natural and free of any harmful additives or artificial ingredients. With regular use, our herbal supplement can help you regain control over your bladder, improve bladder function, and reduce the frequency and urgency of trips to the bathroom. Try it today and experience the benefits of natural bladder support.

description: Formulated with Organic Wheat Grass Harvested from Kansas, USA Adds a Mild, Grassy, and Sweet Flavor to Recipes Mix into Smoothies, Shakes, Yogurt, or Oatmeal for an Added Nutritional Boost Suitable for Vegetarians  California Gold Nutrition® Superfoods  Organic Wheat Grass Powder can give all your favorite foods a healthy boost. It’s the perfect addition to smoothies, shakes, yogurt, and oatmeal and can even be baked into your favorite dishes.
review_text:
I recently started taking this wheat grass powder after hearing about its numerous health benefits. Although I can't comment on the long-term effects just yet, I wanted to share my initial impressions. 

First and foremost, I found the taste to be quite pleasant, contrary to some of the less favorable reviews I've read. It's not gross at all; in fact, I actually enjoy it. I appreciate that it's easy to incorporate into my daily routine.

I'll be sure to update this review as I continue to use the powder and see any potential results. For now I'm pleased with both the taste and the quality.

review_title: Superfoods, Organic Wheat Grass Powder, 8.5 oz  (240 g)
review_text:
Sure, here's a review focusing on those aspects:

---

**Superfoods Organic Wheat Grass Powder Review**

**Quality:** Superfoods Organic Wheat Grass Powder impresses with its high-quality organic ingredients. It's evident that care has been taken in sourcing and processing to maintain nutritional integrity.

**Ingredients:** The powder contains pure organic wheat grass, free from additives or fillers, ensuring a concentrated dose of nutrients like chlorophyll, vitamins, and minerals.

**Package:** The packaging is sturdy and well-sealed, maintaining freshness. The resealable bag is convenient for easy access and storage.

**Ease of Use:** Mixing the powder into smoothies, juices, or water is effortless. It dissolves well without clumping, making it versatile for daily use.

**Benefits:** Regular consumption supports detoxification, boosts energy levels, and provides a rich source of antioxidants, promoting overall health and vitality.

Overall, Superfoods Organic Wheat Grass Powder stands out for its quality ingredients, convenient packaging, and ease of use, making it an excellent choice for health-conscious individuals seeking a nutrient-rich supplement .

review_text: I love that this wheatgrass powder is organic. Every morning I mix a small spoonful in a glass of water & drink it. It takes a bit to get used to but it is so beneficial to your health I don't mind it :) you can always mix it in a smoothie too. Great product!

review_text: This is my first time trying wheatgrass and using powdered form so I can't compare it to any other product. It smells grassy and the taste reminds me of matcha. Doesn't taste as good as matcha in my opinion but I've also gotten used to it just mixed with water. This doesn't dissolve very well. You might have a better time using a blender. I haven't noticed any benefits. Nothing bad either. I've only been using this for a few weeks so maybe it's too early to tell. The price is reasonable.

review_text:
There is no dought that this is a very good quality product with natural, organic ingredients that can possibly be beneficial to your health. However, after reading about the presence of chemicals called lectins contained in greens such as wheat grass and barley grass, I decided to give this product a miss in the future. I am intolerant to gluten and this is a likely indicator that there may also be a lectin intolerance. After all, gluten is a lectin. This is something not many people know or understand. I was enlightened by Dr Gundry's work on lectins and after this point I make sure to choose carefully what greens, and even vegetables I eat, and I have been better for it. Just because I experienced stomach discomfort by taking wheat grass and barley grass, it doesn't mean you will too and it also doesn't mean that you will attribute your discomfort to the ingredients in this supplement. 

Please like my review if you found it helpful 👍🏼.

review_title: Energize Your Health with California Gold Nutrition Organic Wheat Grass Powder!
review_text:
California Gold Nutrition's Organic Wheat Grass Powder has been a part of my daily wellness routine for the past few months, and I'm impressed with the benefits it has brought to my health and energy levels.

The packaging of this product is simple and effective. The 8.5 oz (240 g) size is generous and provides a substantial amount of wheatgrass powder for its price. The resealable bag ensures that the powder remains fresh and dry, which is crucial for preserving its nutritional value.

The taste and texture of this wheatgrass powder are surprisingly pleasant. It has a slightly earthy and grassy flavor, which I found easy to incorporate into my morning routine. I usually mix it with water or blend it into my morning smoothie, and it blends well without clumping. There's a slight grittiness, but it's not overwhelming and doesn't affect the overall experience.

The nutritional benefits of wheatgrass are well-known, and this organic powder doesn't disappoint. It's packed with essential vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, providing a natural energy boost and supporting overall health. I've noticed an increase in my energy levels and overall vitality since incorporating this into my daily regimen.

The fact that it's organic is a big plus for me, as I prefer products that are free from pesticides and chemicals. Knowing that I'm consuming a pure and natural source of wheatgrass makes me feel even better about my choice.

One downside is that the taste might not be for everyone. If you're not accustomed to green, earthy flavors, it might take some getting used to. However, the benefits far outweigh any initial hesitation in my opinion.

Another aspect to consider is the convenience factor. It's more convenient than juicing fresh wheatgrass, but it still requires some effort in mixing or blending. However, the trade-off between convenience and the health benefits is well worth it for me.

In conclusion, California Gold Nutrition's Organic Wheat Grass Powder is an excellent addition to a healthy lifestyle. It provides a natural energy boost, supports overall health, and is packed with essential nutrients. While the taste might not be everyone's favorite, the benefits make it a worthwhile choice for those looking to enhance their well-being with a superfood. I recommend giving it a try and experiencing the positive impact it can have on your health.

Energy and Stamina: Maca root is celebrated for its potential to increase energy levels, enhance endurance, and promote physical vitality, making it a valuable asset for those seeking a natural energy boost.
Hormonal Balance: This adaptogenic herb is known for its ability to potentially balance hormones, providing support for both men and women in managing hormonal health.

review_text:
This Product is made with Organic Blue-Green Algae from India
It contains much  Protein and Antioxidants
Add it to Smoothies, Shakes, or Yogurt
It is Blue-Green, Mild, and having Algae Flavor.
It is all organic and cheaper compared to other similar Product.
I tried it many times & i am very happy about its beneficial results.

Spirulina (Arthrospira platensis) is a type of blue-green algae known as a superfood because it is one of the most nutritious and concentrated food sources in the world. California Gold Nutrition SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder is a convenient way to add more of this green superfood into your diet. Blend it into your daily shake or smoothie or sprinkle it over your yogurt or oatmeal.

Benefits of Spirulina
As a powerful superfood, spirulina contains many naturally-occurring nutrients, like protein, phycocyanin, chlorophyll, and carotenoids.

review_title: A Green Powerhouse: My Take on SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder
review_text: In my quest for a healthier lifestyle, I discovered SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder, 8.5 oz (240 g), and decided to integrate it into my daily nutrition. Spirulina, a type of blue-green algae, is famed for its impressive nutrient profile and health benefits. Here's my experience after incorporating this superfood into my routine for the past couple of months.Taste and Texture: Spirulina has a distinctive, somewhat "fishy" taste, which can be off-putting to some. However, when mixed into smoothies, juices, or even yogurts, its flavor becomes almost imperceptible. The powder itself is fine and blends well, although it does turn everything a deep shade of green.Nutritional Benefits: This spirulina powder is a nutritional powerhouse, rich in protein, vitamins (especially B vitamins), minerals (including iron and magnesium), and antioxidants. I started taking it to boost my energy levels and support my immune system, and I've definitely noticed a difference. My energy has been more consistent, and I've felt generally healthier and more resilient against common colds.Ease of Use: The powder format is incredibly versatile. I've experimented with adding it to various dishes and drinks. My favorite way to consume it is blended into a morning smoothie with fruits, which masks the taste while still delivering all the benefits.Effectiveness: It's hard to quantify the effect of any one supplement, but I can say that since adding spirulina powder to my diet, I've noticed an overall improvement in my energy and vitality. It's also been a great way to ensure I get a broad spectrum of nutrients in my diet, especially on days when my vegetable intake is less than optimal.Digestibility: I was initially concerned about potential digestive issues, as spirulina is quite high in fiber, but I've had no adverse effects. It seems to have actually contributed positively to my digestive health.Value: Given the density of nutrients and the amount of product you get, I find this spirulina powder to offer excellent value for money. It's an affordable and efficient way to supplement a healthy diet.Final Verdict: SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder has earned a permanent spot in my pantry. It's an easy, effective way to boost my nutritional intake, and I appreciate the versatility and health benefits it offers. For anyone looking to enhance their diet with a nutrient-rich superfood, I highly recommend giving this spirulina powder a try.

review_text: It helped me with a fatty liver. My son is non verbal one with Autism with past history of epileptic convulsion. But thanks to this product, he  got rid of his fatty liver & bloating of his stomach in few months by just taking it. I also haven't stop taking it already for several months. It alleviates my lever issues owing to my age and occasional alcohol intake. I would like to recommend the product to all my acquaintances.

California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex uses natural herbal extracts from milk thistle, turmeric, and other plants to help support liver health.* Milk Thistle Benefits Milk thistle (Silybum marianum ) is a flowering herb known for its potential health benefits. It is suitable for vegetarians and vegans and formulated without gluten, GMOs, or soy. review_title: Standout for those looking to support their liver health
review_text: California Gold Nutrition's Silymarin Complex is an excellent dietary supplement that features a high-quality blend of ingredients including Milk Thistle Extract, Dandelion, Artichoke, and Curcumin C3 Complex, with the added benefits of Ginger and BioPerine for enhanced absorption. Each ingredient is chosen for its potential to support liver health and detoxification processes. The capsules are of a manageable size, making them easy to incorporate into a daily wellness routine. The inclusion of BioPerine, a form of black pepper extract, is particularly noteworthy as it significantly enhances the bioavailability of the curcumin and other components, maximizing the health benefits of each capsule. Overall, this product is a standout for those looking to support their liver health with a well-rounded, effective supplement.

After finishing the bottle, I did another liver panel and my doctor and I were both pleased to see a wonderful difference in the results!

review_title: Much better than my previous silymarin supplement!
review_text:
I love CGN's supplement because of a variety of reasons. Firstly the package comes with 360 capsules! That's a very generous quantity of milk thistle for such a price! The pills are also relatively easy to swallow and one of the reasons I love them is because it doesn't have the “after swallow” issue that I have previously had with other milk thistle supplements.

Basically other supplements when swallowed disintegrated very fast and I could taste the unpleasant thing! But not so with this one!

Milk thistle is a traditional herb that has potential benefits to liver health. I take two pills daily with food.

review_title: Milk thistle truly aids in liver health.
review_text: Milk thistle truly aids in liver health. Two years ago, I underwent a body check and the results showed that my liver wasn't in good shape, with an extremely high ALT/SGPT. This was alarming as such high levels could indicate potential liver damage or issues. Back then, I was heavily consuming sports supplements but didn't focus on any liver-related supplements. After receiving the body check results, I stopped all supplements and retested a few weeks later, with my ALT/SGPT returning back to normal levels. This made me take liver health more seriously and I noticed that milk thistle was beneficial to liver health. I began taking this supplement every morning. When I went for a body check last year, my ALT/SGPT levels were normal. This reaffirms that this supplement truly helps!

review_title: Comprehensive Liver Support with Silymarin Complex
review_text:
California Gold Nutrition's Silymarin Complex is a top-quality supplement designed for comprehensive liver support and detoxification. This product combines potent ingredients such as milk thistle extract, dandelion, artichoke, curcumin, ginger, and BioPerine, ensuring maximum absorption and effectiveness.

Each capsule is filled with high-quality ingredients that aid in liver detox and promote healthy bile production. Since incorporating this supplement into my routine, I have noticed significant benefits in my liver function and overall wellness. The 360 veggie capsules come in a well-sized package, providing an extended supply that fits seamlessly into my daily regimen.

The capsules are easy to swallow and have no unpleasant taste, making them a convenient addition to any diet. The inclusion of BioPerine enhances the absorption of the other ingredients, ensuring you receive the full benefit of each component.

For those looking to support liver health and detoxification, California Gold Nutrition's Silymarin Complex is an excellent choice.

Pros:

High-quality ingredients like milk thistle extract and curcumin
Promotes liver health and detoxification
Supports healthy bile production
Enhanced absorption with BioPerine
Convenient 360-capsule package
Easy-to-swallow veggie capsules with no unpleasant taste

review_text:
Silymarin Complex is a dietary supplement that combines the benefits of Milk Thistle Extract, Dandelion, Artichoke, and Curcumin C3 Complex to support liver health and overall well-being. Here's a breakdown of each ingredient:

- Milk Thistle Extract (Silymarin): Supports liver health, promotes liver cell regeneration, and protects against toxins.

- Dandelion: Enhances digestion, supports liver and kidney function, and acts as a natural diuretic.

- Artichoke: Boosts liver function, supports healthy cholesterol levels, and aids in digestion.

- Curcumin C3 Complex: Potent antioxidant properties, reduces inflammation, and supports joint health.

This supplement is designed to:

- Support liver health and function
- Promote digestion and nutrient absorption
- Enhance antioxidant defenses
- Reduce inflammation
- Support overall health and well-being

By combining these ingredients, Silymarin Complex offers a comprehensive approach to supporting liver health and overall wellness. As with any supplement, consult with a healthcare professional before adding it to your routine.

product_name: 2 oz Kanna Tincture Alcohol-Free Healing Herbals
description:
2 ounces of Kanna Tincture 

Alcohol-Free 

Vegetable Glycerin based 

Glass bottle & dropper 

All of our Kanna is harvested in accordance with the Conservation Control Authority of South Africa.

We care deeply about conservation so the growing practices are always all Organic.  Natural Mood Support: Experience the ancient mood-enhancing benefits of Kanna, a revered herb traditionally used by South African indigenous cultures. Our tincture provides a convenient way to harness the calming and uplifting effects of Kanna.

Pure and Potent: We extract our Kanna using a method that preserves the plant's natural alkaloids, ensuring a high-quality, potent tincture. Our product is free from artificial additives and preservatives, delivering pure Sceletium tortuosum in every drop.

Easy to Use: Packaged in a 1 oz (30ml) bottle with a dropper, our Kanna Tincture makes it easy to incorporate this powerful herb into your daily wellness routine. Simply add a few drops to water, tea, or your favorite beverage.

Ethically Sourced: Our Kanna is ethically sourced from sustainable farms, ensuring the highest quality product while supporting responsible farming practices.

Calm and Clarity: Ideal for those seeking natural support for stress relief and mental clarity. Kanna's adaptogenic properties help to manage stress and improve focus without the side effects associated with synthetic alternatives.

Our main growers are fully involved with a formal benefit sharing arrangments with the San and Khoikhoi - the traditional
custodians of the sceletium knowledge. Specifically the !Kai Korana Community and South African San Council.

We ship compostable and in a glass container. 🌍

Thanks for all your support, our shop is a small but our heart is big ❤

Located & shipping out of New York State ✈

I had a 3cm kidney stone and I felt like I was dying on the vine, The pain was out of control. I went to the ER, which we NEVER do. I was there all day, and that was the culprit. 
A year later, in February 2020 I reluctantly went back to the ER. This time I was admitted with multiple stones, when I say multiple, I mean 15 stones in each kidney. The largest being 14.5cm, yes “fourteen.five”. They tried lithotripsy three different times to no avail. I was then sent to a doctor in Indianapolis, and he had to do surgery on both kidneys. Percutaneous surgery on one side. 
I had a friend who recommended Chanca Piedra and Kidney Complete as she had started her daughter on this instead of all the medications the doctors put you on. It has been 2 ½ years and I have not had a sign of any since. PTL I was directed to this website to get these products. I am grateful this was recommended to me. 
Thanks go out to the people who answer the phones, as they are very knowledgeable and helpful!

review_text: After my last totally ineffective lithotripsy (urologist says I remain in the 8% group - since 92% experience successful stone shattering / passing with lithotripsies...), with mounting bills (still paying...), and knowing I cannot afford surgery or another procedure......I had to try something else. I have not been back for any x-ray or CT scan, so I have no way of knowing for sure whether the stones are all still there (2 in left kidney, 1 in left ureter, smaller 1 in right kidney -- but that one rarely lodging any complaints...); but since I started taking the Chanca Piedra tincture I have experienced no pain. There was some barely noticeable burning (you know -- the urination / passing kind of burning -- very familiar from years of experience)....so I'm hoping / praying / trusting these stubborn stones are dissolving and passing some matter little by little. Note: I have been taking the full recommended dosage of three separate 30-mil cap-fulls daily (morning, noon, evening). I have not yet weaned myself down to just one or two cap-fulls daily -- don't want to "go there" yet; but I can say that I have been without pain or even nagging aches for over a month-and-a-half now, when before starting the tincture, I was at least aching throughout the day, and at times in breath-taking pain. Admittedly, as noted above -- I have no images as proof -- so this is just anecdotal before-&-after, but I am a happy customer so far. Much appreciate the prompt shipping and customer service.

review_text: As a result of a severe instance of a congested liver over twenty years ago, I began something of a personal 'crash course' to educate myself about what natural healing procedures might be available to me. I learned about the value of herbal cleanses; one such especially effective herbal regime may have saved my life. Over the years I have tried others but none of them have ever included Chanca Piedra as an ingredient. While cited as being especially targeted for addressing kidney and gallbladder issues, because of the close functional relationship between the healthy functioning of the gallbladder and liver, and having been a bit overdue for a kidney cleanse, I decided to try straight Chanca Piedra for the first time by purchasing the 16oz bottle. After taking the dosage regime recommended as a cleanse (as distinct from the more concentrated dosage specific to suffering from kidney stones, per se), I was so impressed with the results, I decided to immediately purchase a second 16 oz. bottle to use according to the twice-monthly maintenance dosage. If the safety and effectiveness of this CNPUSA product is any indication, I will certainly be a future customer of their liver cleanse and, intermittently, other products; almost certainly on a life-long basis. When I discover something of real value it becomes a 'touchstone' that I cherish. This is one of those cases.

review_title: CNP's Extract of Chanca Piedra healed my digestive pain!
review_text: Thank you so much CNP for making such a pure and easy to use extract of chanca piedra! I had had profound digestive pain for over a year and no doctor nor naturopath was able to help me heal the pain. I was told about your liquid extract of the chanca piedra and given good information on how it might help so I tried it and it worked! I have been pain free for two months now and am thrilled! Amazingly I had even tried chanca piedra in capsule form but was not able to perceive results from it....only your liquid extract got through to my body and healed me. I am so thankful for your help. Love from Ruthie D. in California.

review_title: Didn't seem to do much of anything.
review_text:
I've been reading about how California poppy extract has some relaxation benefits, and thought I'd give this a shot. 

Taking the recommended dosage a couple of times, I can't really say that it did much of anything. As an alcohol extract, you get that strong taste of alcohol if you try it directly under your tongue, with a mild flowery aftertaste. The next couple of times, I tried mixing it in with my daily green drink and didn't really notice the flavor - but didn't really notice anything else, either.

review_text:

The veggie capsules are easy to take and fit well into my daily routine. I've noticed a marked improvement in my mood stability and a reduction in feelings of stress and anxiety since I started taking this supplement.

I stopped taking it after several months and slowly but surely started to feel the depression and anxiety again. I wasn't convinced that the SJW helped me before due to his negativity about SJW but now that I'm taking it again within a week I'm so much better. This pill helps me wake up happy!!!

review_title: Elevate Your Mood Naturally with California Gold Nutrition St. John's Wort
review_text:
California Gold Nutrition's St. John's Wort has been a welcomed addition to my daily wellness regimen, and it's quickly become a trusted companion in supporting my emotional well-being.

One of the standout features of this product is its European quality. EuroHerbs, known for their rigorous quality standards, have delivered a potent 300 mg dose of St. John's Wort in each of the 60 veggie capsules. This reassures me that I'm getting a reliable and effective product.

St. John's Wort is renowned for its potential to alleviate mild mood swings and promote emotional balance. I've personally found that this supplement has helped me maintain a more positive outlook on challenging days and provides a sense of inner calm.

The veggie capsules are easy to swallow and gentle on the stomach. I appreciate that they are suitable for vegetarians and vegans, making them accessible to a wide range of dietary preferences.

It's important to note that the effectiveness of St. John's Wort can vary from person to person, and it may take a few weeks of consistent use to experience noticeable results. I would recommend consulting with a healthcare professional, especially if you have any pre-existing medical conditions or are taking other medications.

One minor drawback is that St. John's Wort can make your skin more sensitive to sunlight, so it's essential to take precautions when exposed to the sun. However, this is a known side effect of this herbal supplement and is not specific to this particular brand.

In summary, California Gold Nutrition St. John's Wort offers a natural and European-quality option for those seeking to support their emotional well-being. While it may not provide immediate results and should be used with caution, it's a worthwhile addition to a holistic approach to mental health. If you're looking for a natural mood booster, these veggie capsules are worth considering.

As for the product, it arrived promptly and was securely packaged. I was impressed by the attention to detail in ensuring that the item arrived in perfect condition. The quality of the product itself was outstanding. It lived up to its description and delivered on its promises.

What sets iHerb apart is their commitment to offering a wide range of high-quality products. Furthermore, the pricing on iHerb is competitive, and they often have attractive discounts and promotions. Their customer service team is also responsive and helpful, addressing any queries or concerns promptly.

In conclusion, my experience with iHerb has been exceptional. From their user-friendly website to their impressive product selection and top-notch customer service, they have won me over as a loyal customer. I highly recommend iHerb to anyone looking for high-quality natural products.

review_text: Pine bark extract has antioxidant and anti-inflammatory effects and has been studied in a wide range of clinical conditions, including asthma, attention deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD), chronic venous insufficiency, cardiovascular disease, diabetes and erectile dysfunction. However, many clinical trials are methodologically weak, which makes it difficult to justify. Good quality, natural ingredients.Convenient packaging.

California Gold Nutrition French Maritime Pine Bark Extract features this powerful extract and helps promote several aspects of overall health when taken daily.* Benefits of Pine Bark Pine bark contains potent polyphenol antioxidant compounds called proanthocyanidins. Due to the high concentration of low mass molecular procyanidins, it is one of the most purified pine bark extracts on the market. review_title: Makes the production of nitric oxide from arginine more efficient
review_text: Arginine is used to make nitric acid, which helps blood vessels dilate and lowers blood pressure. 1998 Nobel Prize for this discovery. But with arginine supplements, only 1% can make through the stomach, intestines, and liver. Which is why you take L-Citrulline, of which 80% gets through because it bypasses the liver, and then converts to arginine. That's 80 times as much arginine naturally relaxing your blood vessels! Pine bark helps you use that arginine to make nitric oxide. The three highest sources of Procyanidins are Grape Seed Extract, Pine Bark and Pycnogenol. Proanthocyanin bioflavonoids are virtually identical whether they come from pine bark, grape seeds, lemon tree bark, cranberries, or hazel nut tree leaves. The difference is in the varying concentration in the different plant. Grape Seed Extract has the highest concentration of Proanthocyanin's, 95% concentration. This is a very good product that I use in my daily regimen.

product_name: BulkSupplements.com Grape Seed Extract Powder - Antioxidant Supplement - Vein Support Supplements - Eye Pressure Support (250 Grams)
description:
What Is Grape Seed Extract?

Grape seed extract is derived from the ground up grape seeds used to manufacture red wine.


Grape Seed Extract Benefits

Grape seed extract is rich in antioxidants and contains powerful chemicals, such as resveratrol, which may promote overall wellness.† It may help support the cardiovascular system and maintain weight in individuals when taken in conjunction with diet and exercise.† It may contribute to the skin and fortify the joints.† Grape seed extract may support and promote kidneys and liver function.† It may also support the brain which helps promote cognitive function.†


† These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.


BulkSupplements.com Grape Seed Extract Features:
ingredient: Grape Seed Extract ( Vitis vinifera L. ) (Seed)
review_text: You definitely need to mix this with something that will hide the bitter taste :)  Of course, I could always opt for capsules, but I prefer mixing powders with a liquid.

BH Herbal Solutions Bladder Control is a natural and effective solution for individuals who suffer from urinary incontinence, overactive bladder, and other bladder-related issues. Our supplement is made from a blend of potent herbs that have been traditionally used to support bladder health and improve urinary function. Our herbal blend helps strengthen the muscles in the bladder, reduce inflammation, and support optimal bladder and urinary tract health. Our formula is completely natural and free of any harmful additives or artificial ingredients. With regular use, our herbal supplement can help you regain control over your bladder, improve bladder function, and reduce the frequency and urgency of trips to the bathroom. Try it today and experience the benefits of natural bladder support.

description:
What Is Stone Breaker (Chanca Piedra)?

Stone breaker is a common tropical plant found in coastal areas. It is also known as chanca piedra (Phyllanthus niruri), Gale of the Wind, or Seed-Under-Leaf.


Stone Breaker (Chanca Piedra) Benefits

Stone breaker (chanca piedra) has a wide variety of benefits, including supporting kidney function and contributing to the heart and cardiovascular system.† It may help maintain blood glucose levels in individuals and support joints.† Stone breaker fortifies the immune system, promotes liver function, and may also aid digestion.†


† These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

Valerian Root has been used for centuries as a natural remedy for insomnia and anxiety. California Poppy is a gentle herb that helps to soothe nighttime discomfort, making it easier to fall and stay asleep. With 100 capsules and 600mg per serving, you can rest easy knowing that you'll have a good night's sleep whenever you need it. Made with great love for Mother Earth

At Secrets of the Tribe, we turn to Earth for help to support and strengthen our health. Thanks to modern technology, we are now able to get the best out of every herb — a pure and rich herbal capsules that contains all the beneficial properties and valuable nutrients. We create every bottle with the purpose of serving those who seek the path to long-lasting wellness. Our love for the planet ties together with our core belief that nature heals.
